column1: The '''Fragrant Trees''' were those species of trees which grew in [[Nísimaldar]]
column2: a western region in the Island of [[Númenor]]. The name derived from the sweet scent which came from their leaves
column3: their flowers and even their bark. They were brought from [[Tol Eressëa| Eressëa]] by the [[Elves]] who navigated towards Númenor. Later
column4: they were planted in other regions of the island
column5: though they did not grow in such high numbers.<ref>{{UT|Numenor}}</ref>
